Home.title: Ku soo dhawoow Sida aan u bartay Python
Home.subtitle: Wadada dhameystiran ee noqoshada horumariyaha Python
Home.description: Buuggan wuxuu bixiyaa hab nidaamsan oo lagu barto Python, laga bilaabo aassaaska ilaa aad u diyaargarowdo inaad noqoto horumariye. Waxaan halkaan ku soo bandhigayaa sida aan u bartay Python iyo talooyin ku saleysan waayo-aragnimadeyda.

beginner.title: Ku Habboon Bilowga
beginner.description: Ku bilow aassaaska oo dhis saldhig adag

practical.title: Mashaariic Wax Ku Ool ah
practical.description: Baro adigoo sameynaya mashaariic dhab ah oo sii adkaata

comprehensive.title: Wadada Dhameystiran
comprehensive.description: Laga bilaabo aassaaska ilaa horumarinta xirfadeed oo ay ku jiraan Git, APIs, iyo waxyaabo kale

Guide.title: Buugga Barashada Python
Guide.intro: Tallaabo-tallaabo, sida aan u bartay Python, ku hage noqoshada horumariyaha xirfadda leh

step1.title: Baro aassaaska
step1.content: Marka hore, waxaad u baahan tahay inaad barato waxyaabaha ugu fudud sida amarrada print iyo fikradaha aasaasiga ah ee barnaamijyada. Waxaa jira laba hab oo la taliyay:

options.option1: Daawo Fireship (fiidiyowyada gaagaaban) oo isla markiiba ku samee waxqabad. Tani waxay fiican tahay haddii aad doorbideyso hab waxbarasho oo ficil ku saleysan.
options.option2: Raac cashar nidaamsan ama koorso. Ikhtiyaarrada la taliyay waxaa ka mid ah Mosh ama Tech with Tim. Mosh wuxuu leeyahay cashar bilow oo heer sare ah oo daboolaya aassaaska Python.

step2.title: Samee Mashaariic Fudud
step2.content: Kadib, hel khibrad wax ku ool ah adigoo sameynaya mashaariic yaryar. Isku day inaad sameyso ciyaaro fudud sida tic-tac-toe ama ciyaaro shabakad leh sida Connect 4.

step3.title: Baro Git
step3.content: Si aad u noqoto horumariye, waa inaad fahanto Git. Waa mid aad u fudud marka loo eego sida uu u muuqdo. Fireship wuxuu leeyahay fiidiyowyo badan oo waxtar leh oo sharaxaayo Git iyo sida loo isticmaalo si fudud.

step4.title: Qaado Mashaariic Caafimaad leh
step4.content: Hadda oo aad fahamtay aassaaska, isku day inaad qaadato mashaariic adag oo u muuqda in ay ka sareeyaan heerkaaga hadda.

details.detail1: Dooro mashaariic kugu dhiirigelisa ama kugu soo jiidata.
details.detail2: Mashruucaagu waa inuu ka koobnaadaa fikrado cusub sida:

concepts.packages: Isticmaalka baakado iyo maktabado dibadda ah

examples.title: Tusaalooyinka Mashaariicda
examples.example1: Website aasaasi ah oo isticmaala API dadweyne si uu u soo bandhigo macluumaad
examples.example2: Ciyaar leh interface garaafis sax ah

step5.title: Samee Codsi Full-Stack ah
step5.content: Wakhti ayaa ku yimid inaad isku keento wax walba oo aad sameyso codsi full-stack ah oo leh isticmaalka saxda ah ee Git, xog-ururin, iyo bog internet xirfadeed oo isticmaalaya HTML, CSS, iyo suurtogal JavaScript.

step6.title: Tababar Wareysiyada Farsamada
step6.content: Hadda oo aad tahay horumariye, u diyaar garow wareysiyada farsamada adigoo ku tababaranaya qaab-dhismeedyada xogta iyo algorithms. Kuwani waxay noqon karaan kuwo adag balse muhiim u ah codsiyada shaqo. Tababar bogagga sida LeetCode ama NeetCode.

channels.title: Kanaalada YouTube-ka
channels.techwithTim: Tech with Tim - Python Sida Ugu Dhaqsaha Badan (Baro Python ku dhawaad 75 daqiiqo)
channels.mosh: Mosh Python Course - Koorsada Buuxda ee Python ee Bilowga (6 saacadood, qaybo lagu kala qaybiyey)
channels.brocode: Bro Code - Koorsada Buuxda ee Python bilaash ah, faahfaahsan laakiin kooban

git.title: Kheyraadka Git
git.explanation: Fireship: Git oo lagu sharaxay 100 ilbiriqsi

practice.title: Goobaha Tababarka
practice.leetcode: LeetCode - Tababar su'aalaha wareysiyada iyo algorithms
practice.neetcode: NeetCode - Dhibaatooyin iyo xallinta mashaariic badan

courses.title: Koorsooyinka La Taliyay
courses.harvard: Cilmiga Kombiyuutarka ee Harvard (CS50) - Hordhaca Cilmiga Kombiyuutarka

About.title: Aniga
About.name: Jabril Mahamud
About.biography: Waxaan aad u xiiseeyaa caawinta dadka kale inay bartaan coding iyo inay noqdaan horumariyayaal guuleysta. Iyada oo aan leeyahay waayo-aragnimo sanado badan oo ku saabsan horumarinta Python iyo waxbaridda, waxaan sameeyay buuggan si aan u bixiyo hab nidaamsan oo lagu barto barnaamijyada.

siteReason.title: Sababta aan u Sameeyay Boggan
siteReason.description: Dad badan ayaa i weydiya sida looga bilaabo barnaamijyada iyo injineerinka software-ka. Anigu ma ihi macallin, balse waxaan sameeyay boggan maxaa yeelay su'aashan ayaa badanaa iga soo noqnoqda, waxaanan rabay inaan bixiyo kheyraad nidaamsan oo loogu talagalay bilowga.

contact.title: Nala Soo Xiriir
contact.description: Haddii aad qabto su'aalo ama aad u baahan tahay hagid gaar ah, xor ayaad u tahay inaad nala soo xiriirto!

engineer.title: Injineer Software - BP | London
responsibilities: Waxaan sameeyay microservices backend ah oo ku qoran C# iyo Node.js
Waxaan naqshadeeyay RESTful APIs oo maareeya in ka badan 10,000 codsi ilbiriqsi kasta

apprentice.title: Tababare Injineer Software - BP | London
responsibilities: Waxaan dhisay codsiyo full-stack ah oo isticmaalaya Python, Django, iyo JavaScript
Waxaan hagaajiyay nidaamyada Amazon EC2, taasoo yareysay kharashaadka sanadlaha ah

energy.title: Madal Falanqaynta Suuqa Tamarta
description: Waxaan naqshadeeyay microservices qaabaysan oo ku qoran Node.js & C#
Waxaan isku xidhay hawlaha Azure Serverless oo xog-ururin la leh
Waxaan sameeyay dashboards React ah oo lagu soo bandhigo xogta
Tiknoolaji: Node.js, React, TypeScript, C#, Azure

pipeline.title: Habka Socodsiinta Xogta Waqtiga-Dhabta ah
description: Waxaan dhisay nidaam kormeerka EC2 oo ku qoran Python
Waxaan sameeyay dashboards analytics waqtiga-dhabta ah oo isticmaalaya React & Django
Tiknoolaji: AWS, Python, React, Django, PostgreSQL
